name: Slashdot Flat Greyscale
description:
Mostly done.  The logged in parts haven't been finished but almost all of the site while logged out works for the most part.

This is ugly uncleaned code but it works.  I'll organize it better once it's done.  Slashdot is such a pain to try and code for because their code base is absolute rubbish, reminds me of all the table based layouts back in the day.
obsoletion_message: I haven't yet styled the logged in parts but it's a work in progress.
additional_info:
If anyone has any bugfixes or changes, feel free to contact me, site is a beast to navigate and I've most likely missed something.

I also forgot to say that I started with the "Slashdot (Original) Dark [CFH]" style but have added content significantly.

I've been trying to get automated screenshots but the site here seems to be broken in that regard.
